data.message: Facebook 50 people sent to edit edit the name of the page and there is no response from the Administration please tell us the approximate number of how many you should send the editing that you have approved it and gave the opportunity to change the title of the page the error only in one letter and very much want to fix administration we ask you very very very please answer the question in advance thank you very much

replies.message: Facebook My biggest dream as anyone fix this bug I had invested a lot of effort on my page and I am very sorry that the name called not gramatično please anyone help me how can send you a link in the message to look?
